contentList.content: Like any other skill, using devil fruit powers can be hardwork on a users body, so rest is needed to regain the strength. Perform a short rest to recover the points.
The Gomu Gomu No Mi, or the Gum Gum Fruit, gives your body rubber like properties. You adapted your fighting style to fit in your new ability to stretch.
Eating a Devil Fruit can give you immense power that allows you to fight an army on your own. It also has great drawbacks such as the sea hating you and thus all water weakens your abilities.

You made an enemy with the Sea God and now when you are <LSTag Tooltip="Wet">Wet</LSTag> all attacks on you have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="Movement">Movement</LSTag> is quartered, and have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> saving throws.

Devil Fruit users are when submerged in water are lose energy to fight and become sluggish. Attacks at the owner now have <LSTag Toolkit="advantage">advantage</LSTag> while <LSTag Toolkit="wet">wet</LSTag>.
As a rubber man you have a <LSTag Tooltip="Resistence ">Resistence</LSTag> to <LSTag Tooltip="Bludgeoning">Bludgeoning</LSTag> and an <LSTag Tooltip="Immunity">Immunity</LSTag>.
Due to your rubber body you have a weakness to slashing damage.
Due to your rubber body you have a weakness to piercing damage.
